full_text:

On Sat, Jul 10, 2010 at 8:25 PM, <SnowfireL@...> wrote:

>
>
> Did you get the picture i sent?  I don't really know how it relates, but it
> once worked, spirit used it to speak through it, some how forming vocal
> cords out of this ectoplasm like stuff I think.  The trumpet would sit on a
> desk or floor, and lift up all by itself, and sometimes fly around the room
> to each person, I had a really hard time believing, but I checked things out
> over the years, and when a room full of about 15 to 20 people all hear the
> name, "Abraham Lincoln" in thin air speak his name, and he has a deep strong
> voice too, then ya gotta believe.  We were told back in the early 60's that
> one day, we would have a phone where we would be able to speak with loved
> ones on the their side.  So, you inventors that have been given this
> privilege, and soon, well, you,ll see. sf
>
>

>>
>>   It's going to sound silly to you Frank, but I still have my old spirit
>> trumpet, it's about 60 or more years old now, i got it from a man that made
>> them back in the heydays for spiritualism, it would sit in the middle of a
>> room, where people sat for seance, and it would take the energy of the
>> people and from the medium, and a glass of water was in the room and fly
>> about, and get direct spirit voice, it's said, that at one time spirit was
>> able to some how form these "spiritual vocal cords" inside the trumpet pipe,
>> and talk.  I know, it sounds crazy, but it did use to happen, and it was not
>> a gimmick, Trumpets are made of a hard aluminum pipe light weight long tube,
>> i have a picture of it if you'd like to see it, maybe it's the same type
>> principle  your using in the box. sf
>>
>> -----Original Message-----
>> From: Frank Sumption <purplealiengirl@...>

>> Sent: Sat, Jul 10, 2010 1:56 pm
>> Subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Just the chamber and speaker
>>
>>
>>    When I first "got" the idea for the box, using a chamber was poionted
>> out to me kinda telepathicly. It seems to function as a space where the
>> sound can be manipulated easier by the entities, and using different
>> materials seems to get different levels. When I use aluminum, that seems to
>> facilitate ET contact more often than not using the chamber. Using pipe
>> helps make the chambers smaller. Thre seems to be a filtering effect by the
>> chamber that tends to enhance the voices. Most of the boxes I make have an
>> option to use the chambers.
>>
>>  The mind contact that poined out the chamber--I think--was that shadow
>> guy on the group home page.
>>
>>  F-S
>>
>> On Sat, Jul 10, 2010 at 12:30 AM, <SnowfireL@...> wrote:

>>>
>>>  F-S
